name: always
trans: Every time; all the time without stopping.

name: best
trans: Better than all the others; the most good.

name: children
trans: More than one child; young boys and girls.

name: duck
trans: A bird that swims and says quack.

name: everyone
trans: Every person; all people.

name: family
trans: People who are related to you, like parents, brothers, and sisters.

name: garden
trans: A piece of ground where you grow flowers, fruits, or vegetables.

name: hill
trans: A raised area of land that is smaller than a mountain.

name: idea
trans: A thought or plan in your mind.

name: jumping
trans: Pushing yourself off the ground with your legs (happening now).

name: kindness
trans: Being nice and caring toward others.

name: longest
trans: The most long; taking the most time or distance.

name: mother
trans: A female parent; your mom.

name: nothing
trans: Not anything at all; zero things.

name: outside
trans: Not inside a building; in the open air.

name: pretty
trans: Nice to look at; beautiful.

name: quickly
trans: In a fast way; doing something with speed.

name: river
trans: A large stream of water that flows through the land.

name: snow
trans: White frozen water that falls from the sky in winter.

name: together
trans: With each other; in the same place.

name: until
trans: Up to the time when something happens.

name: vacation
trans: Time away from school or work for fun and rest.

name: window
trans: An opening in a wall with glass that lets light in.

name: x-ray
trans: A special picture that shows the inside of your body, like your bones.

name: yellowish
trans: A little bit yellow in color.

name: zookeeper
trans: A person who takes care of animals at a zoo.

name: alone
trans: By yourself; with no one else around.

name: because
trans: For the reason that; telling why something happens.

name: close
trans: To shut something or to be near something.

name: draw
trans: To make a picture with a pencil, crayon, or pen.

name: enough
trans: As much as you need; not too little.

name: friend
trans: Someone you like and who likes you; a pal.

name: girl
trans: A female child.

name: homework
trans: School work that you do at home.

name: important
trans: Something that matters a lot and is very special.

name: joyful
trans: Full of happiness and joy.

name: kitchen
trans: The room where food is cooked.

name: love
trans: A very strong feeling of caring about someone or something.

name: morning
trans: The early part of the day, from when you wake up until noon.

name: nearby
trans: Close; not far away.

name: overcome
trans: To beat a problem or difficulty; to get past something hard.

name: place
trans: A spot or location; somewhere you can be.

name: quietness
trans: The state of being quiet; when there is no noise.

name: rainbow
trans: A colorful arc in the sky that appears after rain.

name: something
trans: A thing that is not named; some object or idea.

name: teacher
trans: A person who helps students learn at school.

name: understood
trans: Knew what something meant (past tense of understand).

name: visit
trans: To go to see someone or a place.

name: world
trans: The Earth and all the people and places on it.

name: xerox
trans: A copy of a paper or document.

name: yourself
trans: You; your own self.

name: zipping
trans: Closing something quickly with a zipper.

name: above
trans: Higher than something; over it.

name: between
trans: In the middle of two things.

name: could
trans: Was able to do something; might be able to.

name: different
trans: Not the same; not alike.

name: earth
trans: The planet we live on; also the soil or ground.

name: funny
trans: Something that makes you laugh.

name: ground
trans: The surface of the earth that you walk on.

name: happy
trans: Feeling joy and pleasure; not sad.

name: inside
trans: In or into a building or container; not outside.

name: jumping
trans: Pushing yourself off the ground with your legs (happening now).

name: keeping
trans: Continuing to have something; not giving it away.

name: late
trans: After the expected time; not on time.

name: music
trans: Sounds made by singing or playing instruments that are nice to hear.

name: nearer
trans: Closer; not as far away.

name: one
trans: The number 1; a single thing.

name: party
trans: A fun gathering of people to celebrate something.

name: queenly
trans: Acting like a queen; royal and graceful.

name: reading
trans: Looking at words and understanding them (happening now).

name: sometimes
trans: Not always, but on some occasions; once in a while.

name: today
trans: This day; the day we are in now.

name: until
trans: Up to the time when something happens.

name: very
trans: A word that means really or a lot.

name: wonder
trans: To think about something or want to know about it.

name: xylophone
trans: A musical instrument with bars that you hit with small hammers to make sounds.

name: youngster
trans: A young person; a child or young boy or girl.

name: zest
trans: Great excitement and energy; enthusiasm.

name: along
trans: Moving forward in a line; going with someone or something.

name: behind
trans: At the back of something; not in front.

name: climb
trans: To go up something like a tree, ladder, or hill.

name: dance
trans: To move your body to music.

name: early
trans: Before the usual or expected time; near the beginning.

name: forest
trans: A large area with many trees growing close together.

name: giraffe
trans: A tall animal with a very long neck and spots.

name: horse
trans: A large animal with four legs that people can ride.

name: idea
trans: A thought or plan in your mind.

name: jelly
trans: A soft, sweet food that wobbles and is often eaten with peanut butter.

name: kangaroo
trans: An animal from Australia that hops and carries its baby in a pouch.

name: laugh
trans: To make sounds that show you think something is funny.

name: morning
trans: The early part of the day, from when you wake up until noon.

name: nice
trans: Pleasant and good; kind and friendly.

name: outside
trans: Not inside a building; in the open air.

name: pumpkin
trans: A large, round, orange vegetable often used for Halloween.

name: quietly
trans: In a way that makes little or no noise.

name: riverbank
trans: The land along the side of a river.

name: school
trans: A place where children go to learn.

name: tall
trans: High; having great height from top to bottom.

name: upstairs
trans: On a higher floor of a building; up the stairs.

name: voices
trans: The sounds that more than one person makes when speaking or singing.

name: warm
trans: A little bit hot; a comfortable temperature.

name: yesterday
trans: The day before today.
